title: This Valentine's Day, First Profess Your Love, Then Talk Money
summary: On February 14, you might agree to spend the rest of your life together. But will you agree about money? This, of course, is hardly the most romantic notion. But it could be crucial to your marriage's success.
tag-1: This Valentine's Day, First Profess Your Love, Then Talk Money
tag-2: On February 14, you might agree to spend the rest of your life together. But will you agree about money? This, of course, is hardly the most romantic notion. But it could be crucial to your marriage's success.
tag-3: A Utah State University study found that couples who reported disagreeing about money once a week were roughly 30% more likely to get divorced than couples who said they disagreed just a few times per month.
